stories.title: Hastening Linux process cleanup with process_mrelease

stories.text:
Hello HN,

My team is waiting to get into the Startup School founder match, so in the meantime we thought we'd post here.

We currently run a bootstrapped business that generates $2m per year and we want to launch our first hardware venture. I'm curious if there are any electrical or mechanical engineers in the Los Angeles area?

The product is a life-sized 3d-printer like device that will be used in the health and beauty space. We are looking to put together the team, finance the MVP while raising angel funds.

Please comment if you're interested or email me (address in my profile) Thank you!
stories.title: Ask HN: Any electrical or mechanical engineers in LA?

stories.text:
With remote work becoming ever more common, there are a lot of "digital foot prints" that companies can track.

We have Microsoft with their teams' analytics and companies like Worklytics that integrate with your email, calendar and chat.

What's your opinion on this new type of people analytics?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your views on people analytics and privacy?
